results.name: Total number of primes (with multiplicity) dividing A064413(n).
link: J. C. Lagarias, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The EKG sequence, arXiv:math/0204011 [math.NT], 2002.
J. C. Lagarias, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The EKG sequence, Exper. Math. 11 (2002), 437-446.
Index entries for sequences related to EKG sequence
mathematica: ekg[s_] := Block[{m = s[[-1]], k = 3}, While[MemberQ[s, k] || GCD[m, k] == 1, k++]; Append[s, k]];
PrimeOmega /@ EKG (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 02 2018, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ in A064413 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 18 2001
